Dragonfly::

Dragonfly tried to avoid the shot but he moved in that way that the 
shot hit in one of his wings. He couldn't able to fly.
He shot 25 agaisnt Hot rod

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He did a front flip over the shots and brought his saw down towards
> Dragonfly. He was so close that he would be able to reach out at hit
> Dragonfly no matter where Dragonfly tryed to dodge. He was going to 
get
> a piece of him. He brought the saw down right towards the head.
